org.sm.smtools.application.registry

Interface Hive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemHive

    public interface Hive
extends java.io.Serializable
    The Hive marker interface is used for containers in the global registry.

    In order to associate a group of objects with the global registry, a class implementing the Hive interface should be created. This class can then contain the objects themselves. Special care should be taken that all its fields are serialisable, as the global registry (as well as the hives) can be loaded from and stored to file.

    Version:
    27/06/2004
    Author:
    Sven Maerivoet
    See Also:
    Registry
